title: Course Structure
text:
sequence

general: broad objectives (research workflow, reproducibility, collaboration), main differences between i & ii
d2m-r i: course description, objectives, logistics
d2m-r ii: course description, objectives, logistics

textbook is a work in progress, you can contribute for course credit!

title: Project Submission
text:
Use this form to submit work to the grading queue. Creating a pull request on your repo and/or tagging instructors will not count as submission.
See more about how to submit work for D2M-R in the GitHub submissions guidelines.
